body_html:
@moskomule I have just cloned and installed the latest version of pytorch in a new environment, installed jupyter notebook after updating pip, and I have no problems now importing pytorch in a jupyter notebook.

I'm closing this issue now as fixed, but let me know if it still doesn't work for you
